page.title: 14WOODLAND
page.content: Conifers reach maturity in fifty to sixty years; deciduous in eighty to one hundred and twenty years. There are four main zones under our wood- land research: CHASE HOTEL: all the trees in the grounds fall under a Preservation Order. We counted approx 235 trees in the grounds. CHASE WOODS east of the forest are mainly conifer those to the west are mostly decid- uous e.g. oak and ash. Some parts of the forest have trees lettered in white paint, indicating those to be felled next. In the deeper forest the bottom branches are in the majority dead due to shortage of light to the roots. Evidence of stoats in the forest. Run by the Forestry Commission with a full-time ranger.
